dcterms:creator: Bert Wang-Chak Chan
dcterms:description: Lenia is a continuous version of Conway's Game of Life that exhibits complex, life-like patterns, merging characteristics of cellular automata and reaction-diffusion systems.
dcterms:title: Lenia

dcterms:creator: Bert Wang-Chak Chan
dcterms:description: The expanded universe of Lenia includes additional variants and configurations that enhance the study of its dynamics and pattern formation.
dcterms:title: Lenia and expanded universe

dcterms:creator: Shigeru Kondo
dcterms:description: The Kernel-based Turing model (KT model) is a mathematical framework for studying biological pattern formation through non-local interactions.
dcterms:title: Kernel-based Turing model (KT model)

dcterms:creator: Takako Kawaguchi
Reiji Suzuki
Takaya Arita
Bert Chan
dcterms:description: Asymptotic Lenia introduces asymptotic behavior to the state-updating rule in Lenia, allowing for a differential equation representation.
dcterms:title: Asymptotic Lenia

dcterms:creator: Hirokazu Ninomiya
Yoshitaro Tanaka
Hiroko Yamamoto
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the dynamics of reaction, diffusion, and non-local interactions in biological systems.
dcterms:title: Reaction, diffusion and non-local interaction

dcterms:creator: Q Tyrell Davis
Josh Bongard
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates the impact of step size as a critical parameter in continuous cellular automata.
dcterms:title: Step size in continuous cellular automata

dcterms:creator: Szymon Cygan
dcterms:description: The Nonlocal Kondo model examines pattern formation through non-local interactions in a mathematical context.
dcterms:title: Nonlocal Kondo model

dcterms:creator: Alan Mathison Turing
dcterms:description: This foundational work discusses the chemical basis of morphogenesis, introducing concepts that underpin reaction-diffusion systems.
dcterms:title: Chemical basis of morphogenesis

dcterms:creator: M. Gardner
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the combinations and patterns arising from John Conway's Game of Life, a foundational cellular automaton.
dcterms:title: Mathematical games: the fantastic combinations of John Conway’s new solitaire game ‘life’

dcterms:creator: Kellie M Evans
dcterms:description: Larger than Life is a variant of cellular automata that explores the dynamics of digital creatures in a two-dimensional space.
dcterms:title: Larger than life
